intro: Source viewer: tree + code + minimap; supports preset and user notes.

notes.content: File intro comes from intros[filePath] in public/data/source-notes-preset.json, and preset notes are rendered under matching code lines when enabled.
onMounted order: load preset notes → restore user notes/collapsed/folded → fetch files.json to build the source tree (fetchPath points to raw/*.txt).
Preset notes support anchor matching (match/matchRegex) in addition to line numbers to reduce drift when code changes.
Preset notes are fetched from BASE_URL + data/source-notes-preset.<lang>.json, so the same build can work under GitHub Pages subpaths.
Preset notes are resolved on-demand per file: currentPresetNotes + fileLines → Map(line → content). This is what the UI uses to decide which lines show preset notes.
